alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 6:35PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee, including the following counties, in North Mississippi, Alcorn, Benton and Tippah. In West Tennessee, Chester, Hardeman, Hardin, Henderson, Madison and McNairy. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Corinth, Lexington, Savannah, Henderson, Bolivar, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Chickasaw State Park, Chickasaw State Forest, Adamsville, Sardis, Silerton, Masseyville, Pocahontas, Jacks Creek, Theo, Shiloh, Morris Chapel and Mifflin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Chester; Hardeman; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy
